newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT-Salomon starts Fairey FAY as "hold".
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Salomon starts Fairey FAY as "hold".

text.p: Fairey Group Plc was rated "hold" as Salomon Brothers began coverage of the stock, the investment bank said on Monday.
In a research note, analyst Mark Davies Jones said weak European demand and sterling's strength limited the scope for organic growth at the specialist electronics, aerospace and defence group.
He said the stock looked fully valued on a 14 percent prie-earnings premium on the basis of expectations for 1997.

"The short-term outlook for the stock is dull, but we believe that the strength of the group's market positions in electronics and its proven record of successfully managing expansion justify holding the shares for the longer term," the note said.
